website_summaries.verdict: An ideal tire for mountain bikers who want to go off the beaten trail.
pros: Great traction on trails and climbs
The tread lasts a long time
The tire itself rarely goes flat
cons: Side walls were defective in some tires

customer_reviews.title: best bang for you buck
customer_reviews.text: These tires are great. I have built multiple bikes and currently have 3 trail bikes I interchange. I use these tires on my angry single speed hardtail because they are a fast and grabby tire. My other bikes have wtb velociraptor, those are great all mountain tires but very slow tires compared to panaracer. The only upgrade I see from this tire is dropping $$$ on a set of continentals.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth E. McCarron

customer_reviews.title: 2nd set didn't last very long
customer_reviews.text: This is my second set of Panaracer Fire XC tires. The first set was awesome and lasted about 4-5 years without any issue. That is saying something because I live in Austin, TX where the trails are nothing but limestone rock and cactus. However, I've only ridden these tires maybe 3 times and already had a double pitch flat. There is something about the sidewalls of these that aren't as good as the last set.
customer_reviews.author: Merc

customer_reviews.title: Good tire, not the larger size like most modern mountain bikes.
customer_reviews.text: This is a good looking tire for either the front or back of a bike depending on the direction you mount it, I originally intended on this as a replacement for a bike with the slightly larger style tires, keep in mind this is what I’d call a “regular” size tire. I ended up putting it on another bike that kind of needed a tire and it matched well.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Beeman

customer_reviews.title: Good 26 x 2.10 MTB tires
customer_reviews.text: Look good and perform well. Great at $30 a piece. The ones I received are MADE IN JAPAN, not the inferior TAIWANESE versions.
customer_reviews.author: LNE

customer_reviews.title: Stellar performer
customer_reviews.text: Knobby enough, but still rolls well on pavement. I ride mostly packed dirt, some gravel/sand, and rocks. Great grip except in sand, obviously.
customer_reviews.author: CL

customer_reviews.title: Good tires
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sophisticated enough to know if these are the best tires I've ever ridden. But, I've used them on three MTB rides, mostly gravel road cruisers, and the they have performed very well. Oregon can get wet, I've used these tires in both very wet and moderately wet conditions, they work great.
customer_reviews.author: J. L. Morris

customer_reviews.title: tire width
customer_reviews.text: great tread, but much narrower tire than advertised. probably closer to a 1.9" sand and loose stuff will not be its friend. not happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Tyres....depends on the current price.
customer_reviews.text: I got these for crazy cheap then the price got jacked up a day later. For what I paid I really cant complain. They work great and are not the cheep imitation Panaracers people have been talking about. Great sidewall and tread.
customer_reviews.author: Beer is food

customer_reviews.title: This tire has been great on hardpack/semi-loose terrain
customer_reviews.text: I've ridden this tire for about 10 miles in far west Texas. This tire has been great on hardpack/semi-loose terrain. It does as well as possible in sand, and makes steep climbs and descents a breeze. Very satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Ozzy  Medrano

customer_reviews.title: I've only used it on compact dirt but overall I think it would be good in a variety of conditions and I'd recommend it
customer_reviews.text: This tire seems well built and has a very rugged look. I've only used it on compact dirt but overall I think it would be good in a variety of conditions and I'd recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Mestrezat

customer_reviews.title: Good tire
customer_reviews.text: Nice tire, lots of nubs both on top of the tire & on the sides. Good for both front & rear, I put mine on the rear & I'm rollin' faster & more sure than ever.
customer_reviews.author: james coyne

customer_reviews.title: Great tire at a really great price
customer_reviews.text: Could not believe the price. Great tire and the price was so low I could not believe it. Once order it arrived one day early. New tires on the bike same day and got in almost 15 miles of great single track here in So Florida.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Sichler

customer_reviews.title: Great handling
customer_reviews.text: Tire works great. have had it for over a year now, and the aggressive tread is still very prominent. Will purchase this tire again in the near future
customer_reviews.author: Rusty

customer_reviews.title: Great mountain bike tires!
customer_reviews.text: The tires were delivered on time, however I asked for the black & white and received the red ones. Other than that the tires are great tires. I purchased for my wife's bike and she seems to be very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: sb4x4trex

customer_reviews.title: Great sidewall and middle grip
customer_reviews.text: Great sidewall and middle grip. This is a terrific all-around tire for the price. Use it mostly on packed dirt.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Rich

customer_reviews.title: Arrived early
customer_reviews.text: I was happy to get it but I had ordered black on black and it came red on black, wouldn't be a big deal if it matched my front tire.
customer_reviews.author: Sbabbitt

customer_reviews.title: Happy with these
customer_reviews.text: Riding in the desert, much better grip and traction than Velociraptors
customer_reviews.author: Oiram

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great off road tire gripping is so good no issues with slipping A++
customer_reviews.author: Vincent Costantino

customer_reviews.title: Great tires
customer_reviews.text: Only about 50 miles on these tires so far, but they have performed great for me. (Dirt and hardpack) These are a great inexpensive tire. I especially like the looks. The red bead looks sharp!
customer_reviews.author: Bouffantloup

customer_reviews.title: Seems unstable
customer_reviews.text: This tire seems unstable to me compared to the previous tire I had. Not sure if there is too much flex in the side wall or if it just tends to wobble.
customer_reviews.author: Shade

customer_reviews.title: Ok Cross country tire
customer_reviews.text: Well, it is cheap comparing to other real mountain bike tires. It has limited braking traction when use in the rear rotation. It works well on smooth fire road, bike path or pavement. This slides around on technical single track. I prefer WTB Velociraptor and Maxxi.com High Roller II over this one at any time.
customer_reviews.author: Trader John

customer_reviews.title: Great tire
customer_reviews.text: Great all around tires folks, and just in case your all wondering these are the made in Japan version with 127 TPI. Much lighter and a little tougher than the taiwan version.
customer_reviews.author: sclogger

customer_reviews.title: NOT UST!
customer_reviews.text: These are NOT UST tires, I told the vendor and sent them back, but they are still advertised as such.
customer_reviews.author: Eric ONeal

customer_reviews.title: Very Thin Sidewalls
customer_reviews.text: Sidewall is really thin. After only a few weeks and no aggressive riding, the sidewall is worn through. Brakes are adjusted properly. Couldn’t have been anything more than a light rub that caused it. Otherwise, tire seems fine.
customer_reviews.author: COLDESU

customer_reviews.title: Awesome MTB tire
customer_reviews.text: Just knobby enough, and it still rolls well on pavement. I ride mostly packed dirt, some gravel/sand, and rocks. Great grip all around. Be careful on wet concrete - they do slip a bit in turns.....like mostly all knobby tires. Hope they keep making these in 26".
customer_reviews.author: Fortis Lupus

customer_reviews.title: My favorite technical trail tire, but the tread wears fast
customer_reviews.text: This has been my favorite technical trail tire for a long time. It's good on rock, dirt and gravel. It's not quite as good in mud or show. Stellar traction both front and rear. Front tire slip is predictable on most surfaces. The big downside is the cost per mile. The tread compound is pretty soft and wears fast.
customer_reviews.author: R. McKown

customer_reviews.title: These tires are great! They really dig in and give me a ...
customer_reviews.text: These tires are great! They really dig in and give me a lot more confidence around the corners and going up steep hill climbs. And the price can't be beat!
customer_reviews.author: D. Casey

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great tires, great traction and they look amazing on my bike.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus Saylor

customer_reviews.title: I have a set of this tires I had for ...
customer_reviews.text: I have a set of this tires I had for 5years and I put 3000 miles on them and I had them on 3 bikes
customer_reviews.author: Jeff knight

product_meta.title: Panaracer Fire XC Wire MTB Tire
product_meta.description: The Panaracer Fire XC Pro UST 26" x 50mm Tubeless Moutain Tire is an aggressive all-around tire; multi-height knobs for traction in all conditions. Features: Tire fits Mavic UST wheelsets Zero Slip Grip Natural tread compound integrates more natural rubber to decrease rolling resistance and increase tread wear life A mix of 2, 3, and 5mm center knobs, tall cornering knobs, color stripe on sidewall made of Silica compound for added durability Aggressive, all-around tire Multi Step Knobs perform well in all conditions without loosing performance or adding rolling resistance ASB Anti Snake Bite Chafer is a proprietary anti-rebound rubber strip that reduces the chance of pinch flats by an average of 40% BAX Advanced Extra Cord uses extremely narrow .14mm diameter cord which is woven at a super high density into the casing for lightness and flexibility and improves resistance to cuts and abrasions Silica Compound; adding silica to tire treads improves tire life, durability and grip
feature_bullets: Rubber Compound: StandardTire Bead: WireTire Detail Color: Black/BlackTire Diameter: 26"Tire Width: 2.1"

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
